channel.title: How to fix your compiler! (: (common!)
channel.description:
Hey, the first thing you do is go to http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp and download JDK the JDK should say (JDK-6u19) after you download it install it to your computer and whatever else it says. after that go to your compile and right click and press edit, then erase it and put:
@echo off title Jeff's kick ass compiler! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Then it should work, thanks for viewing and i hope this helps!!!! PLEASE COMMENT!!! (:
range ftw101
«

item.title: How to fix your compiler! (: (common!)
item.dc:creator: @range_ftw101 range ftw101
item.description:
@range_ftw101 wrote:

Hey, the first thing you do is go to http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp and download JDK the JDK should say (JDK-6u19) after you download it install it to your computer and whatever else it says. after that go to your compile and right click and press edit, then erase it and put:

@echo off
title Jeff’s kick ass compiler!
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Then it should work, thanks for viewing and i hope this helps!!! PLEASE COMMENT!!! (:

                                        range ftw101

«
